name: Army Special Commando Squad
description:
Army Special Commando Squad is a very popular commando shooting game with a very smooth gameplay. This commando shooting game revolves around a secret commando agent who has assigned to clear the enemy from base camp by using his special shooting skills. As a real commando with special and high level training to stop the enemies before they attack on your base camp destroy your army.


Army Special Commando Squad: Features

HD graphics and high quality textures.
Impressive and smooth gameplay
realistic shooting sound.
free to download.
